name: Astronaut Runner 3D
description:
In this game, you are in control of an astronaut on a mission!

Run around the courses avoiding exciting obstacles and collecting diamonds!

Use those diamonds to unlock various items and equipables, such as different awesome colors and unique hats!

(P.S)
This game is only available for Android devices, the game can be downloaded through the link below:

Astronaut Runner 3D

This is an early version of the game, please report any bugs or inconsistencies to the following email: dolpinhdevinfo@gmail.com

Thanks and enjoy the adventure!
